version_description:
* Show Open Orders in the Accounts Tab
* Bug fixes
* Buy, sell and manage your open orders

* In the Chat you can easily message somebody by nickname (via @name)
* Bug fixes

* Improve Charts usability (use two fingers to pinch and zoom)
* Select time period in My Trades
* Fix "Restore Purchases" that was not working in some edge cases

* Support landscape on iPhone and iPad
* Make URL's in Chat tapable
* Make volume bars in Chart bigger (more similar to web version)
* Add button to zoom the Chart in or out quickly
* Restore old default zoom level on Chart
* Add new alerts feature for price changes

* Improve battery consumption
* Edit alerts
* New Today Extension that shows your account balances
* New Today Extension that shows your favorites
* Allow blocking users in the chat
* For some users Alerts were not working directly after the update to iOS 11 - this update fixes this issue
* Small bug fixes
* Optimized for iPhone X

* Search for coins
* Dark mode

* Fix colors in Today Extension
* Fix crash when adding favorites while searching
* Add setting to disable Chat entirely
* Bug fixes

* Fix passcode issue - you might have to set a new one - sorry about that!
* Reset Chat history so a web version is finally possible after this update.
* Fix crash when blocking a user

* Log in to Chat via Twitter
* Improve dark mode colors

* Fix problem with API credentials - unfortunately the affected users may have to enter them again. Sorry about that!
* Support log out from Chat (of course you can log in via Twitter again later)
* Add new section in SETTINGS that answers some Frequently Asked Questions

* Fix passcode issue - you might have to set a new one - sorry about that!
* Reset Chat history so a web version is finally possible after this update.
This is now the official app of Poloniex

Now you can trade on Poloniex directly from your phone by using your API key to authenticate!

If you haven't yet created an API key, you can do so at https://www.poloniex.com/apiKeys. To login easily, try saving your API key and secret to a password manager like 1Password.

Now you can trade on Poloniex directly from your phone by using your API key to authenticate!

If you haven't yet created an API key, you can do so at https://www.poloniex.com/apiKeys. To login easily, try saving your API key and secret to a password manager like 1Password.

Now you can trade on Poloniex directly from your phone by using your API key to authenticate!

If you haven't yet created an API key, you can do so at https://www.poloniex.com/apiKeys. To login easily, try saving your API key and secret to a password manager like 1Password.
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Poloniex is ready for iOS 12, enjoy!
Introducing USD//Coin, a fully collateralized fiat stablecoin. Check out USDC on Poloniex and learn more at https://www.centre.io/usdc.
You can now login to the app with your email and password, making it even easier to trade on Poloniex.

New and Improved Trading Experience

Take a deeper dive into your favorite markets with our new and improved charts! Use trading view charts to see the price of each market for all time and toggle between candlestick and line charts.

Each market screen also now surfaces your relevant balances so you know what you have in your account each and every time you make a trade.

You can now more easily check your portfolio's performance and keep tabs on your transactions —Poloniex's new Wallet and Activity tabs allow you to easily manage your balances, deposits, withdrawals, open orders and trade history.

A New Account Tier is Here
Start trading in seconds with our new Level 1 accounts. All you need is an email address and password and you’ll be trading in no time. Upgrade to Level 2 for higher withdrawal limits, additional trading features and increased security.

Poloniex Futures is Fully Live
With this update, you'll get full access to Poloniex Futures where you can trade Bitcoin futures with up to 100x leverage and get industry-leading maker rebates. You can also transfer your balance between your Exchange wallet and your Futures wallet so you can get started with Futures on the go.

Poloniex Futures is Fully Live
With this update, you'll get full access to Poloniex Futures where you can trade Bitcoin futures with up to 100x leverage and get industry-leading maker rebates. You can also transfer your balance between your Exchange wallet and your Futures wallet so you can get started with Futures on the go.
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Streamlined Language Support
In this release, we've streamlined the languages we support to provide the best localized experiences possible. We will continue to support English, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Russian, Vietnamese, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, and Thai.

Keep Up with Margin On the Go
In this release, we've added functionality for you to transfer funds into and out of your margin wallet and track your margin positions from the Poloniex app.

Keep Up with Margin On the Go
In this release, we've added functionality for you to transfer funds into and out of your margin wallet and track your margin positions from the Poloniex app.

Margin Trading on the Go
Margin trading is now available on the go in our mobile apps! Quickly transfer between your wallets, open and close positions, and more with our integrated margin and spot trading experience.

This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Upgraded Futures Features
With this update, you’ll find few new features on Poloniex Futures, making it even easier to access your futures positions. You can also keep up with our futures contracts all in one place and get a more in-depth look using our futures contracts' charts.

Improved User Experience
Find your way around the Poloniex App with the new and improved changes to our navigation system, that include:
- Easy-access to Trollbox and Futures via the Navigation bar
- Activity has a new home! View your activity either under Settings or in the top right corner of your Wallets screen
